definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">player_log_in</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">NEQ</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:remaining_ticks</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_add_potion"><field name="potion">CUSTOM:Withering</field><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="duration"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:remaining_ticks</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="entity_add_potion"><field name="potion">CUSTOM:Withering</field><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="duration"><block type="number_variable"><field name="variable">effect_ticks</field><field name="config">CUSTOM:Time</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
